briefdescription.para: Sets the GCLK enable bit in the I2C register to a certain value.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR , which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
The value of the GCLK enable bit

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the command register of the I2C controller.

detaileddescription.para: This ia a blocking function that writes a specified value directly to the I2C command register. It allows manual configuration of the I2C controller for advanced or custom operations.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
The 32-bit value to write to the I2C command register. This value typically contains specific bit fields to configure the I2C operation.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Writes a command value to the I2C command register (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to write a specified command value to the I2C command register in a non-blocking manner. It checks the availability of the command FIFO before writing and updates the provided flag to indicate success.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
The command value to be written to the command register.

Pointer to a boolean flag that indicates whether the command was successfully sent:
true: Command was written successfully.
false: Command was not written (FIFO unavailable or error).

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Reads the data valid flag from the I2C data register.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the current state of the data valid flag in the I2C data register. The flag indicates whether the data is valid for an I2C transaction.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
A pointer to a boolean variable where the state of the data valid flag will be stored. The value is set to true if the data is valid, or false otherwise.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the data last flag in the I2C data register.

detaileddescription.para: This function modifies the data last flag in the I2C data register. The flag indicates whether the current data is the last in an I2C transaction.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
A boolean value specifying the state of the data last flag. Set to true to mark the data as the last in the transaction, or false to clear the flag.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Reads the data last flag from the I2C data register.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the current state of the data last flag in the I2C data register. The flag indicates whether the current data is the last in an I2C transaction.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
A pointer to a boolean variable where the state of the data last flag will be stored. The value is set to true if the data is the last in the transaction, or false otherwise.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the I2C prescaler value.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the prescaler value for the I2C peripheral. The prescaler is used to configure the speed of the I2C communication by adjusting the clock frequency.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
The prescaler value to set for the I2C clock. This value determines the clock frequency for I2C communication.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Gets the I2C prescaler value.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads the current prescaler value from the I2C peripheral. The prescaler determines the clock frequency for the I2C communication.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
A pointer to a 32-bit variable where the current prescaler value will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Reads the Raw Interrupt Status (RIS) register.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads the raw interrupt status register (RIS) of the I2C peripheral. The RIS register provides raw interrupt status flags indicating various conditions within the I2C communication. These flags include information such as FIFO states and errors.

RIS Register Breakdown**:
Bit 0: MISS_ACK - Slave ACK is missed
Bit 1: CMDE - Command FIFO is Empty
Bit 2: CMDF - Command FIFO is Full
Bit 3: CMDOVF - Command FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 4: WRE - Write FIFO is Empty
Bit 5: WRF - Write FIFO is Full
Bit 6: WROVF - Write FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 7: RDE - Read FIFO is Empty
Bit 8: RDF - Read FIFO is Full
Bits [9-31]: Reserved.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
A pointer to a 32-bit variable where the raw interrupt status will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Reads the Masked Interrupt Status (MIS) register.

detaileddescription.para:
This function reads the masked interrupt status register (MIS) of the I2C peripheral. MIS Register Breakdown**:
Bit 0: MISS_ACK - Slave ACK is missed
Bit 1: CMDE - Command FIFO is Empty
Bit 2: CMDF - Command FIFO is Full
Bit 3: CMDOVF - Command FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 4: WRE - Write FIFO is Empty
Bit 5: WRF - Write FIFO is Full
Bit 6: WROVF - Write FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 7: RDE - Read FIFO is Empty
Bit 8: RDF - Read FIFO is Full
Bits [9-31]: Reserved.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
A pointer to a 32-bit variable where the masked interrupt status will be stored.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sets the Interrupt Mask (IM) register.

detaileddescription.para:
This function writes a mask value to the interrupt mask register (IM) of the I2C peripheral. The IM register enables or disables the interrupt sources. The bits set in this register determine which interrupt sources generate masked interrupts. IM Register Breakdown**:
Bit 0: MISS_ACK - Slave ACK is missed
Bit 1: CMDE - Command FIFO is Empty
Bit 2: CMDF - Command FIFO is Full
Bit 3: CMDOVF - Command FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 4: WRE - Write FIFO is Empty
Bit 5: WRF - Write FIFO is Full
Bit 6: WROVF - Write FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 7: RDE - Read FIFO is Empty
Bit 8: RDF - Read FIFO is Full
Bits [9-31]: Reserved.
i2c
An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
mask
A 32-bit mask value to be written to the IM register. Each bit corresponds to a specific interrupt source, with 1 enabling the interrupt and 0 disabling it.
status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Reads the Interrupt Mask (IM) register.

detaileddescription.para:
This function reads the interrupt mask register (IM) of the I2C peripheral. The IM register contains a mask value that determines which interrupt sources are enabled. It shows the status of interrupt enablement for various interrupt sources. IM Register Breakdown**:
Bit 0: MISS_ACK - Slave ACK is missed
Bit 1: CMDE - Command FIFO is Empty
Bit 2: CMDF - Command FIFO is Full
Bit 3: CMDOVF - Command FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 4: WRE - Write FIFO is Empty
Bit 5: WRF - Write FIFO is Full
Bit 6: WROVF - Write FIFO overflow; write 1 to clear
Bit 7: RDE - Read FIFO is Empty
Bit 8: RDF - Read FIFO is Full
Bits [9-31]: Reserved.
i2c
An EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR, which points to the base memory address of I2C registers. EF_I2C_TYPE is a structure that contains the I2C registers.
im_value
A pointer to a 32-bit variable where the interrupt mask value will be stored.
status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Checks if the I2C peripheral is busy.

detaileddescription.para: ! Sets the Interrupt Clear (ICR) register. *!
This function checks the STATUS register of the I2C peripheral to determine if the bus is currently busy. The result is stored in the memory location pointed to by is_busy.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the busy status will be stored:
true: I2C is busy.
false: I2C is idle.

simplesect.para:
status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS:
EF_DRIVER_OK: The operation completed successfully.
EF_DRIVER_ERROR_PARAMETER: i2c or is_busy is NULL.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the command FIFO is available.

detaileddescription.para: This function checks the STATUS register of the I2C peripheral to determine if the command FIFO is not full and ready to accept new commands. The result is stored in the memory location pointed to by is_available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the availability status will be stored:
true: Command FIFO is available.
false: Command FIFO is full.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Checks if the write FIFO is available.

detaileddescription.para: This function checks the STATUS register of the I2C peripheral to determine if the write FIFO is not full and ready to accept new data. The result is stored in the memory location pointed to by is_available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the availability status will be stored:
true: Write FIFO is available.
false: Write FIFO is full.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Checks if the read FIFO is available.

detaileddescription.para: This function checks the STATUS register of the I2C peripheral to determine if the read FIFO is not empty and has data available to be read. The result is stored in the memory location pointed to by is_available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the availability status will be stored:
true: Read FIFO is available.
false: Read FIFO is empty.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a write command to the I2C device (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a write command to the I2C device at the specified address. It blocks until the command FIFO becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
The I2C address of the target device.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a write command to the I2C device (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to send a write command to the I2C device at the specified address. If the command FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
The I2C address of the target device.

Pointer to a boolean where the command status will be stored:
true: Command was sent successfully.
false: Command FIFO was unavailable.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a read command to the I2C device (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a read command to the I2C device at the specified address. It blocks until the command FIFO becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
The I2C address of the target device.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a read command to the I2C device (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to send a read command to the I2C device at the specified address. If the command FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
The I2C address of the target device.

Pointer to a boolean where the command status will be stored:
true: Command was sent successfully.
false: Command FIFO was unavailable.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a start condition on the I2C bus (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a start condition on the I2C bus. It blocks until the command FIFO becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a start condition on the I2C bus (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to send a start condition on the I2C bus. If the command FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the command status will be stored:
true: Start condition was sent successfully.
false: Command FIFO was unavailable.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a stop condition on the I2C bus (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a stop condition on the I2C bus. It blocks until the command FIFO becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a stop condition on the I2C bus (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to send a stop condition on the I2C bus. If the command FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the command status will be stored:
true: Stop condition was sent successfully.
false: Command FIFO was unavailable.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a "write multiple" command on the I2C bus (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function sends a "write multiple" command on the I2C bus. It blocks until the command FIFO becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Sends a "write multiple" command on the I2C bus (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to send a "write multiple" command on the I2C bus. If the command FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.

Pointer to a boolean where the command status will be stored:
true: The "write multiple" command was sent successfully.
false: Command FIFO was unavailable.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Writes data to the I2C Write FIFO (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function writes a single byte of data to the I2C Write FIFO. It blocks until the FIFO becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Data byte to be written to the FIFO.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Writes data to the I2C Write FIFO (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to write a single byte of data to the I2C Write FIFO. If the FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Data byte to be written to the FIFO.

Pointer to a boolean where the write status will be stored:
true: The data was written successfully.
false: Write FIFO was unavailable.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Reads data from the I2C Read FIFO (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function reads a single byte of data from the I2C Read FIFO. It blocks until the FIFO becomes available and validates the data read.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the read data byte will be stored.

simplesect.para:
status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS:
EF_DRIVER_OK: The operation completed successfully.
EF_DRIVER_ERROR_PARAMETER: i2c or data is NULL.
EF_DRIVER_ERROR_I2C_INVALID_DATA: The data read is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Reads data from the I2C Read FIFO (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to read a single byte of data from the I2C Read FIFO. If the FIFO is unavailable, the function returns immediately. The validity of the data is also checked.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a variable where the read data byte will be stored.

Pointer to a boolean where the read status will be stored:
true: Data was read successfully and is valid.
false: Read FIFO was unavailable or data is invalid.

simplesect.para:
status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS:
EF_DRIVER_OK: The operation completed successfully.
EF_DRIVER_ERROR_PARAMETER: i2c, data, or data_read is NULL.
EF_DRIVER_ERROR_I2C_INVALID_DATA: The data read is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Transmits a single byte to a specified I2C address (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function transmits a single byte to a specified I2C address using the Write FIFO. It blocks until all operations (data write, write command, and stop command) are completed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Data byte to be transmitted.
I2C address to which the data will be sent.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

memberdef.argsstring: (EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR i2c, char data, char addr, bool *transmitted)
memberdef.name: EF_I2C_transmitByteNonBlocking

briefdescription.para: Transmits a single byte to a specified I2C address (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to transmit a single byte to a specified I2C address using the Write FIFO in a non-blocking manner. If any step of the process (data write, write command, or stop command) cannot complete immediately, the function returns.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Data byte to be transmitted.
I2C address to which the data will be sent.

Pointer to a boolean where the transmission status will be stored:
true: Data was transmitted successfully.
false: Transmission could not be completed.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Receives a single byte from a specified I2C address (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function reads a single byte from a specified I2C address. It blocks until all operations (read command, stop command, and data retrieval) are completed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a char where the received data byte will be stored.
I2C address from which the data will be read.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: Receives a single byte from a specified I2C address (non-blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function attempts to read a single byte from a specified I2C address in a non-blocking manner. If any step of the process (read command, stop command, or data retrieval) cannot complete immediately, the function returns.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to a char where the received data byte will be stored.
I2C address from which the data will be read.

Pointer to a boolean where the reception status will be stored:
true: Data was received successfully.
false: Reception could not be completed.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

memberdef.argsstring: (EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR i2c, char *data, uint32_t data_length, char addr)
memberdef.name: EF_I2C_transmitCharArr

briefdescription.para: Transmits an array of characters to a specified I2C address (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function sends an array of characters to a specified I2C address. It handles writing the data to the I2C FIFO and ensures the last byte is appropriately marked.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to the array of characters to be transmitted.
Number of characters in the array to transmit.
I2C address to which the data will be sent.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

memberdef.argsstring: (EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR i2c, char *data, uint32_t data_length, char addr)
memberdef.name: EF_I2C_recieveCharArr

briefdescription.para: Receives an array of characters from a specified I2C address (blocking).

detaileddescription.para: This function reads an array of characters from a specified I2C address. It issues the read command for each byte, stores the data in the provided buffer, and sends a stop command after successful reception.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the I2C base address structure EF_I2C_TYPE_PTR.
Pointer to the buffer where the received characters will be stored.
Number of characters to receive.
I2C address from which the data will be read.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: C header file for I2C APIs which contains the function prototypes.
